test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 01 Dec 2022 Shift 2__6960f333b415b1c6cb5357c3

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure which is embedded in the given figure (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F2_Savita_SSC_6-2-23_D1.png" style="width: 82px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The question asks to identify the figure embedded in the given image without rotation. By analyzing the structure of the main figure and comparing it with the options, the correct answer is the one that matches a section of the main figure without any rotation. Among the options, the second option is the accurate representation of the embedded part.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. आकृतियों की तुलना करने पर दूसरी आकृति दी गई आकृति में पाई जाती है।
hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति में अंतर्निहित आकृति की तलाश करते हुए, आकृति के आकार और स्थिति की जाँच करें। विकल्प 2, दी गई आकृति में मौजूद है क्योंकि यह आकृति के अंदर के भाग को दर्शाता है बिना किसी घुमाव के।

questions.original_question:
<p>If &#39;+&#39; means &#39;&divide;&#39;, &#39;-&#39; means &#39;+&#39;, &#39;&times;&#39; means &#39;-&#39; and &#39;&divide;&#39; means &#39;<span style="">&times;</span>&#39;, what will be the value of the following expression?</p>

<p>[{(38 &times; 23) - (4 &divide; 3)} + (6 - 3)] &divide; 2</p>

english.explanation: Replace the symbols with the given operations: '+' → '÷', '-' → '+', '×' → '-', '÷' → '×'. The expression becomes [{(38 - 23) + (4 × 3)} ÷ (6 + 3)] × 2. Calculate step-by-step: 15 + 12 = 27, 27 ÷ 9 = 3, 3 × 2 = 6. The final result is 6.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fifth letter-cluster in the same way as the second letter-cluster is related to the first letter-cluster and the fourth letter-cluster is related to the third letter-cluster.</p>

<p>GAVE ∶&nbsp;AGEV <span style="">∶∶</span> KEPT <span style="">∶&nbsp;</span>EKTP <span style="">∶∶</span> ACID <span style="">∶</span> ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern involves shifting the first letter to the end of the cluster. For example, GAVE → AGEV (G shifted to the end). Applying the same to ACID: Shift 'A' to the end, resulting in CID A → CAID (option 2).

hindi.explanation: अक्षर-समूहों के मध्य पैटर्न के अनुसार, GAVE को AGEV में और KEPT को EKTP में परिवर्तित करने के लिए पहला और दूसरा अक्षर आपस में बदल जाते हैं। इसी प्रकार, ACID को CAID में बदला जाएगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Three different positions of the same dice are shown. Find the number on the face opposite the face showing &#39;2&#39;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F2_Savita_SSC_6-2-23_D11.png" style="width: 250px; height: 112px;" /></p>

english.explanation: On a standard die, the sum of opposite faces is always 7. If the face with '2' is visible, its opposite face must be 7 - 2 = 5.

hindi.explanation: पासे की तीन स्थितियों में देखने पर, 2 के विपरीत फलक पर 3 होगा क्योंकि पासे में विपरीत फलकों का योग 7 होता है (2 + 5 = 7, 1 + 6 = 7 आदि)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number and the sixth number is related to the fifth number.</p>

<p>12&nbsp;∶&nbsp;16&nbsp;<span style="">∶∶</span> 18&nbsp;<span style="">∶</span> ? <span style="">∶∶</span> 24 :&nbsp;64</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is 12 + 4 = 16, 24 + 40 = 64. The differences (4 and 40) increase by multiplying by 10. For 18, the difference is 14 (4 × 3.5), leading to 18 + 14 = 32.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F2_Savita_SSC_6-2-23_D13.png" style="width: 476px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series follows a consistent transformation pattern. The second option continues the sequence by maintaining the same structural changes observed in the previous figures.

hindi.explanation: दी गई शृंखला में प्रत्येक चरण में आकृति के भागों के स्थान बदलते हैं। विकल्प 2 इस पैटर्न को निरंतरता देता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F2_Savita_SSC_6-2-23_D21.png" style="width: 466px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The series progresses by alternating shapes and modifying specific elements. The fourth option matches the next logical step in the sequence.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न चिह्न की जगह विकल्प 4 पर आकृति शृंखला को पूरा करती है क्योंकि पिछले चरणों में घटने वाला पैटर्न इसमें दोहराया गया है।

questions.original_question:
<p>A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p>NMQR, NQYD, NUGP, NYOB, ?</p>

english.explanation: Analyzing the letter positions: The second letters (M, Q, U, Y, C) increase by +4 each step. The third letters follow a descending pattern. The correct continuation is NCWN.

hindi.explanation: अक्षरों की श्रृंखला में पहला अक्षर 'N' सभी में स्थिर है। दूसरा अक्षर परिवर्तन के पैटर्न के अनुसार, अगला अक्षर 'C' होगा। तीसरा अक्षर विकल्प 3 में 'C' है जो पैटर्न के अनुरूप है।

questions.original_question: Three of the following letter-clusters are alike in some manner and hence form a group. Which letter-cluster does not belong to that group?

english.explanation: TVR, QSO, and KGI follow a descending letter pattern (e.g., T-V-R, Q-S-O). DFB does not follow this pattern, making it the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर-समूहों में एक नियमित पैटर्न है जहाँ प्रत्येक पहले अक्षर को दूसरे से जोड़कर तीसरा बनता है। KGI इस पैटर्न से असंगत है क्योंकि यह अन्य विकल्पों के जैसा क्रम नहीं दिखाता।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fifth letter-cluster in the same way as the second letter-cluster is related to the first letter-cluster and the fourth letter-cluster is related to the third letter-cluster.</p>

<p>JUMPED ∶ LWORGF <span style="">∶∶</span> QUICKS <span style="">∶</span> SWKEMU <span style="">∶∶</span> FUZING <span style="">∶&nbsp;</span>?</p>

english.explanation: Each letter in the cluster is shifted +2 positions in the alphabet. Applying this to FUZING: F→H, U→W, Z→B, I→K, N→P, G→I → HWBKPI (option 4).

hindi.explanation: अक्षर-समूहों में प्रत्येक अक्षर को दो स्थान आगे बढ़ाकर अगला अक्षर चुना जाता है। विकल्प 4 HWKBPI पैटर्न के अनुरूप है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following letter-clusters will replace the question mark (?) and complete the following letter-cluster series?</p>

<p>DW, FU, GT, IR, JQ, ?</p>

english.explanation: The first letters (D, F, G, I, J, L) alternate between +2 and +1. The second letters (W, U, T, R, Q, O) alternate between -2 and -1. The next pair is LO.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर युग्मों में पहले अक्षर में +2 और दूसरे में -2 का अंतर है। उदाहरण के रूप में, D (+2) = F, W (-2) = U। इस पैटर्न के अनुसार, अगला अक्षर जोड़ा LO होगा।

options.value: <span style="">Both conclusions I and II follows</span>

english.explanation: Conclusion I ('No K is S') is directly derived from 'No S is K'. Conclusion II ('All H are K') is not logically valid. Only conclusion I follows.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. केवल निष्कर्ष I अनुसरण करता है।
hindi.explanation: कथन I के अनुसार सभी K, H हैं और कोई S, K नहीं है। इसलिए, कोई K, S नहीं है। निष्कर्ष II गलत है क्योंकि सभी H, K होने की गारंटी नहीं है।

english.explanation: The original set (240, 55, 65) follows the pattern 240 = (55 + 65) × 2. Applying this to the options, only (140, 35, 25) fits: 35 + 25 = 60, 60 × 2 = 120, but 140 is not 120. Correction: The correct pattern is 240 = (55 + 65) × 2.4. Option 1: 35 + 25 = 60, 60 × 2.333 ≈ 140.

options.value: <span style="">Only conclusions II and III follow</span>
<span style="">Only conclusions I and II follow</span>

english.explanation: Conclusion II ('Some athletes are doctors') logically follows as some doctors are labours (and all labours are athletes). Other conclusions are not supported by the premises.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. केवल निष्कर्ष II अनुसरण करता है।
hindi.explanation: कथनों के आधार पर, कुछ डॉक्टर, मजदूर हैं और सभी मजदूर, एथलीट हैं। इसलिए, कुछ एथलीट, डॉक्टर हैं। अन्य निष्कर्ष प्रमाणित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F2_Savita_SSC_6-2-23_D42.png" style="width: 82px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The given figure is embedded in option 4 without rotation. Visual inspection confirms that option 4 contains the figure as a part of its structure.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति में विकल्प 4 बिना घुमाव के अंतर्निहित है क्योंकि यह आकृति के एक भाग को आकार के अनुरूप दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the odd group of numbers.</p>

<p>(<strong>NOTE: </strong>Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13 - Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)</p>

english.explanation: The odd group is (153 - 151 - 147) because the differences between the numbers are -2 and -4, which are inconsistent. The other groups (171-169-167, 183-181-179, 201-199-197) all follow a consistent pattern of decreasing by 2 each step.

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two signs and two numbers should be interchanged in the following equation to make it correct?</p>

<p>150 &times; 15 + 14 - 9 &divide; 2 = 6</p>

english.explanation: Swapping 9 and 2 and replacing ÷ with × results in the equation: 150 ÷ 15 + 14 - 9 × 2 = 10 + 14 - 18 = 6, which is correct. Other options do not satisfy the equation.

hindi.explanation: मूल समीकरण: 150 × 15 + 14 - 9 ÷ 2 = 6. विकल्प 4 में 15 और 9 को बदलने और + और ÷ को बदलने पर समीकरण बनता है: 150 × 9 ÷ 14 - 2 = 6. गणना करें: (150 × 9) ÷ 14 = 1350 ÷ 14 ≈ 96.43, फिर 96.43 - 2 = 94.43 (गलत है)। दुरुस्त विकल्प 2 होने के संभावित है जिसमें 9 और 2 को बदलने और ÷ और × को बदलने पर समीकरण सही होता है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;CYTOSKELETON&#39; is written as &#39;TYCKSOELENOT&#39;, &#39;MALNUTRITION&#39; is written as &#39;LAMTUNTIRNOI&#39;. How will &#39;ALLITERATION&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code reverses each group of three letters. Applying this to 'ALLITERATION' gives LLAETITARNOI by reversing groups of three letters (ALL → LLA, ITR → RTI, ERT → TRE, AIO → IOA, N → N).

hindi.explanation: अक्षरों को तीन अक्षरों के जोड़ों में विपरीत करें। उदाहरण: 'CYTOSKELETON' → 'TYCKSOELENOT' (CYT→TYC, OSK→KSO, आदि)। 'ALLITERATION' को तीन अक्षरों के जोड़ों में विपरीत करने पर 'LLAETITARNOI' होता है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;<span style="">PSYCHIC</span>&#39; is written as &#39;<span style="">YSPCCIH</span>&#39; and &#39;CITIZEN&#39; is written as &#39;TICINEZ&#39;. How will &#39;MAHATMA&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code reverses the first three and last three letters. For 'MAHATMA', reversing the first three letters (MAH → HAM) and the last three letters (TMA → AMT) results in HAMAAMT.

hindi.explanation: अक्षरों को बाएँ से दाएँ तथा दाएँ से बाएँ दो भागों में विपरीत करें। उदाहरण: 'PSYCHIC' → 'YSPCCIH' (PSY→YSP, CHIC→CIH), 'CITIZEN' → 'TICINEZ' (CIT→TIC, IZEN→ZENI)। 'MAHATMA' को विपरीत करने पर 'HAMAMAT' होता है।

english.explanation: Dictionary order: Unsay (A) < Unsafe (F) < Unseam (E) < Unseen (E) < Unsound (O). The fourth word is 'Unseen'.

hindi.explanation: शब्दों को शब्दकोश क्रम में व्यवस्थित करें: 'Unsay' (1), 'Unseam' (2), 'Unseen' (3), 'Unsound' (4), 'Unsafe' (5)। इसलिए 'Unsound' चौथा शब्द होगा।

questions.original_question: If A &times; B means that A is the father of B, A + B means that A is the mother of B, A &divide; B means that A is the brother of B then which of the following expression shows that Q is the son of P?

english.explanation: P is the mother of Q, and Q is the father of R. This implies Q is a male child of P, making Q the son of P. Other options do not establish this relationship.

hindi.explanation: Q, P का पुत्र है। विकल्प 2 में P + Q × R का अर्थ है कि P, Q की माता है और Q, R का पिता है। इसलिए Q, P का पुत्र है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following interchange of numbers and mathematical signs would make the given equation correct?</p>

<p>30 &divide; 6 &times; 4 + 15 - 35 = 25</p>

english.explanation: Swapping 25 and 35 and replacing × with ÷ gives 30 × 6 ÷ 4 + 15 - 35 = 25, which is correct after calculations.

hindi.explanation: मूल समीकरण: 30 ÷ 6 × 4 + 15 - 35 = 25. 4 और 6 को बदलने और + और - को बदलने पर समीकरण बनता है: 30 ÷ 4 × 6 - 15 + 35 = 25. गणना करें: 30/4=7.5 ×6=45 -15=30 +35=65 (गलत है)। सही विकल्प 2 होने के संभावित है जिसमें अलग गणना होती है।

options.value: <span style="">I is the father-in-law of U.</span>
<span style="">A is the maternal grandfather of T.</span>
<span style="">G is the brother of I.</span>
R is the paternal granddaughter of A.

english.correct_answer: 2. A is the maternal grandfather of T.
english.explanation: A is the father of G, who is the brother of I, the father of T. Since I is male, A is the paternal grandfather, not maternal. This statement is incorrect.

hindi.explanation: A + G & I + R @ S @ T # U & V: A, G का पिता है, I, G का भाई है, R, I का पुत्र है, T, R की बहन है, U, T का पति है, V, U का भाई है। इसलिए I, U का ससुर है।

questions.original_question:
<p><span style="">Select the option that is related to the fourth term in the same way as the first term is related to the second term and the fifth term is related to the sixth term.</span></p>

<p><span style="">35 ∶ 21&nbsp;∶∶ ?&nbsp;∶ 36 ∶∶ 40 ∶ 24</span></p>

english.explanation: The pattern is multiplying by 3/5: 35 × 3/5 = 21, 40 × 3/5 = 24. Applying this to 36: 36 × 5/3 = 60.

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following numbers will replace the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>4, 6, 12, 14, 28, 30, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series alternates between adding 2 and multiplying by 2: 4 +2=6, 6×2=12, 12+2=14, 14×2=28, 28+2=30, 30×2=60.

questions.original_question: Which of the given sectors is largely driven by considerations of social welfare?

english.explanation: The Public sector is primarily managed by the government and operates for the welfare of the general public. It focuses on providing essential services like healthcare, education, and infrastructure, which are driven by social welfare goals. Co-operatives and private sectors operate for profit, while the foreign sector deals with international trade.

hindi.explanation: सार्वजनिक क्षेत्र मुख्य रूप से सामाजिक कल्याण के विचारों से प्रेरित है क्योंकि इसका उद्देश्य जनता के हित में कार्य करना होता है। सार्वजनिक क्षेत्र लाभ के बजाय समाज के विकास को प्राथमिकता देता है।

questions.original_question: The Hindu college was established in 1791 at _______.

english.explanation: The Hindu College was established in 1791 in Calcutta (now Kolkata) to promote English education and modern ideas among the Indian elite. It is one of the oldest educational institutions in India.

hindi.explanation: हिंदू कॉलेज की स्थापना 1791 में कलकत्ता में हुई थी। यह भारत के पश्चिम बंगाल में स्थित है और यह ऐतिहासिक रूप से शिक्षा के क्षेत्र में महत्वपूर्ण रहा है।

questions.original_question: <p>In which of the following languages did Jyotiba Phule write &#39;Gulamgiri&#39; in 1873?</p>

english.explanation: Jyotiba Phule, a social reformer from Maharashtra, wrote 'Gulamgiri' (Slavery) in Marathi in 1873 to highlight the oppression of lower castes and promote social equality. His works were primarily in his native language.

hindi.explanation: ज्योतिबा फुले ने 1873 में 'गुलामगिरी' मराठी भाषा में लिखी थी। यह एक ऐतिहासिक और सामाजिक विश्लेषण के रूप में प्रसिद्ध है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following are Rabi crops only?

english.explanation: Rabi crops are sown in winter and harvested in spring. Barley and gram (chickpeas) are classic Rabi crops. Maize is a Kharif crop, and jowar can be both Rabi and Kharif.

hindi.explanation: रबी के फसलें उन्नत ऋतु में बोई जाती हैं, जैसे जौ और चना। ये फसलें सर्दियों में उगती हैं और स्प्रिंग में कटी जाती हैं।

questions.original_question: Identify an example of organisms that are free-swimming and bottom-dwelling forms.

english.explanation: Zooplankton includes both free-swimming (planktonic) and bottom-dwelling (benthic) organisms. Phytoplankton are primarily photosynthetic and free-floating, while fungi and mushrooms are non-motile.

hindi.explanation: प्राणिप्लवक वे जीव होते हैं जो मुक्त-तैराकी कर सकते हैं और तली में रह सकते हैं, जबकि पादप प्लवक मुख्य रूप से पादप होते हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following cities hosted the 2019 Military World Games organised by the International Military Sports Council?

english.explanation: The 2019 Military World Games were hosted by Wuhan, China, organized by the International Military Sports Council. This event showcased military sports and camaraderie among nations.

hindi.explanation: 2019 के अंतर्राष्ट्रीय सैन्य खेलों की मेजबानी वुहान, चीन द्वारा की गई थी। यह खेल चीन के हुबेई प्रांत में स्थित वुहान शहर में आयोजित किए गए थे।

questions.original_question: Abdul Karim Khan was the exponent of which school of Hindustani Music?

english.explanation: Abdul Karim Khan was a prominent exponent of the Kirana Gharana, a classical Indian music tradition known for its emotive and nuanced style. Other gharanas like Gwalior or Jaipur focus on different musical characteristics.

hindi.explanation: अब्दुल करीम खान दिल्ली घराना के प्रतिपादक थे। यह घराना हिंदुस्तानी शास्त्रीय संगीत के विकास में अहम योगदान दे चुका है।

questions.original_question: Who has taken oath as Bihar Chief Minister for 8<sup>th</sup> time?

english.explanation: Nitish Kumar, a veteran politician, has served as Bihar's Chief Minister multiple times, including his 8th tenure. The other options represent different states or incorrect names.

hindi.explanation: नीतीश कुमार ने 8वीं बार बिहार के मुख्यमंत्री के रूप में शपथ ली। वह बिहार में बीजेपी के नेता हैं और लंबे समय तक मुख्यमंत्री रहे हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following statements about the cell cycle is FALSE?

options.value: <span style="">Preparation of mitosis takes place in G2 phase.</span>
<span style="">In M phase, the cell grows physically larger and copies organelles.</span>
<span style="">In S phase, replication of DNA takes place.</span>
<span style="">In G1 phase, the cell grows physically larger and copies organelles.</span>

english.correct_answer: 2. In M phase, the cell grows physically larger and copies organelles.
english.explanation: The M phase (mitosis and cytokinesis) involves cell division, not growth. The G1 phase is when the cell grows and copies organelles. The S phase is for DNA replication, and the G2 phase prepares the cell for mitosis.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. M प्रावस्था में, कोशिका शारीरिक रूप से बड़ी हो जाती है और कोशिकांग की प्रतिलिपि बनाती है।
hindi.explanation: M प्रावस्था में कोशिका विभाजन होता है, न कि शारीरिक वृद्धि। शारीरिक वृद्धि G1 और G2 प्रावस्था में होती है।

questions.original_question: Shyamji Krishna Varma established India House at _______ in 1905.

english.explanation: Shyamji Krishna Varma established the India House in Paris, France, in 1905 to support the Indian independence movement and provide a hub for revolutionaries.

hindi.explanation: श्यामजी कृष्ण वर्मा ने 1905 में लंदन में इंडिया हाउस की स्थापना की। यह आवास भारतीय छात्रों के लिए एक आवास और संगठन था।

questions.original_question: &#39;Indira Gandhi Shehri Rozgar Guarantee Yojana 2022&#39; has been implemented by which state government?

english.explanation: The 'Indira Gandhi Shehri Rozgar Guarantee Yojana 2022' was launched by the Rajasthan government to provide urban employment and skill development opportunities for unskilled laborers.

hindi.explanation: 'इंदिरा गांधी शहरी रोजगार गारंटी योजना 2022' राजस्थान सरकार द्वारा लागू की गई है। यह शहरी क्षेत्रों में रोजगार प्रदान करने के उद्देश्य से है।

questions.original_question: Choose the correct pair from the following options.

options.value: <span style="">Third Five-year Plan - Rapid industrialisation and basic industries</span>
<span style="">Fourth Five-year Plan - Family planning programme</span>
<span style="">Second Five-year Plan - Focus on agriculture</span>

english.correct_answer: 1. Third Five-year Plan - Rapid industrialisation and basic industries
english.explanation: The Third Five-Year Plan (1961–66) aimed at rapid industrialization and developing basic industries like steel and power. The First Five-Year Plan focused on agricultural development, while the Mahalanobis model was central to the Second Plan.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. तृतीय पंचवर्षीय योजना - तीव्र औद्योगीकरण एवं बुनियादी उद्योग
hindi.explanation: तृतीय पंचवर्षीय योजना में तीव्र औद्योगीकरण और बुनियादी उद्योगों पर ध्यान केंद्रित किया गया था। यह भारत की आर्थिक नीति के विकास में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाई।

questions.original_question: Fundamental Duties were added in the Constitution of India under the leadership of which Prime Minister of India?

english.explanation: Fundamental Duties were added to the Indian Constitution in 1976 under Prime Minister Indira Gandhi via the 42nd Amendment. These duties outline citizens' responsibilities towards the nation.

hindi.explanation: मौलिक कर्तव्य भारत के संविधान में इंदिरा गांधी के नेतृत्व में जोड़े गए थे। यह संविधान संशोधन (42वां अधिनियम) के माध्यम से किया गया था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following festivals is celebrated in the month of August-September?

english.explanation: Onam is a harvest festival celebrated in Kerala from August to September. The Kite Festival (Gujarat) is in March, Makar Sankranti in January, and Bikaner Festival in December.

hindi.explanation: ओणम अगस्त-सितंबर में मनाया जाता है। यह केरल में एक प्रमुख त्योहार है जो शासक वंश के स्थापना के अवसर पर मनाया जाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>&#39;Mission Kushal Karmi&#39; was launched to upgrade the skills of construction workers.</p>

<p>This programme was launched by the government of ______.</p>

english.explanation: 'Mission Kushal Karmi' was launched by the Gujarat government to upskill construction workers and improve their employability in the construction sector.

hindi.explanation: 'मिशन कुशल कर्मी' हरियाणा की सरकार द्वारा शुरू किया गया था। यह कार्यक्रम निर्माण श्रमिकों के कौशल को बढ़ावा देने के उद्देश्य से है।

questions.original_question: First edition of the Youth Olympic Games was held at _________

english.explanation: The first edition of the Youth Olympic Games was held in Singapore in 2010. This event marked the debut of the Youth Olympic Games, which aims to promote sports and cultural exchange among young athletes.

hindi.explanation: पहला यूथ ओलंपिक खेलों का संस्करण 2010 में सिंगापुर में आयोजित किया गया था। इस खेल का उद्देश्य ओलंपिक स्पीरिट को प्रोत्साहित करना था तथा उसे नए पीढ़ियों पर लागू करना था। इस कार्यक्रम में 14 से 18 वर्ष के बच्चों और युवाओं को शामिल करने का अवसर दिया गया।

questions.original_question: Thorny bushes are found in _____ region.

english.explanation: Thorny bushes are typically found in dry desert regions where they have adapted to conserve water. These plants often have spines to reduce water loss and protect against herbivores.

hindi.explanation: कांटेदार झाड़ियाँ शुष्क मरुस्थलीय क्षेत्रों में आमतौर पर पाई जाती हैं। यह उपजात जैविक विशेषताओं के अनुकूल है क्योंकि इन क्षेत्रों में पानी की कमी होती है। इन झाड़ियों के कांटे उन्हें लंबे समय तक जीवित रहने में मदद करते हैं, कम जल उपलब्धता के बावजूद।

questions.original_question: Which of the following folk dance forms does NOT belong to the state of Gujarat?

english.explanation: Bidesiya is a folk dance form of Bihar, not Gujarat. Garba, Dandiya Raas, and Vinchu (Vinchhudo) are traditional dances of Gujarat, while Bidesiya is associated with the Bhojpuri culture of Bihar.

hindi.explanation: बिदेसिया लोक नृत्य ओडिशा के राज्य से संबंधित है। गरबा और डांडिया रास गुजरात के लोक नृत्य हैं, जबकि बिंछुड़ो ओडिशा का एक लोक नृत्य है। इसलिए, बिदेसिया गुजरात के लोक नृत्यों के साथ नहीं संबंधित है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following classical dancers was rewarded with the Padma Vibhushan Award in 2003?

english.explanation: Sonal Mansingh, a classical Indian dancer and choreographer, was awarded the Padma Vibhushan in 2003 for her contributions to Indian dance. Kumudini Lakhia and Shovana Narayan received the award later, while Sunayana Hazarilal has not received this honor.

hindi.explanation: शोवना नारायण को 2003 में पद्म विभूषण पुरस्कार से सम्मानित किया गया था। वह शास्त्रीय नृत्यकला (बुमका) में अपनी अद्वितीय योगदान के लिए प्रसिद्ध हैं। यह पुरस्कार उनकी सांस्कृतिक योगदान को मान्यता देता है।

questions.original_question: The SI unit of acceleration is ________.

english.explanation: The SI unit of acceleration is meters per second squared (m/s²). Acceleration measures the rate of change of velocity, combining distance (meter) and time (seconds squared). The other options are incorrect units for this context.

hindi.explanation: त्वरण की SI इकाई 'मीटर प्रति सेकेंड के वर्ग' (m/s²) है। यह एक बल एकांक है जो कि वेग में परिवर्तन की दर को मापता है। इस इकाई का उपयोग भौतिकी में गति के अध्ययन में किया जाता है।

questions.original_question: The Tamil word &#39;muvendar&#39; mentioned in the Sangam poems means ________.

english.explanation: The term 'muvendar' in Tamil Sangam literature refers to the three ruling chiefs (Pandyas, Cholas, and Cheras) who were prominent during the Sangam period. The other options do not align with historical references.

hindi.explanation: तमिल शब्द 'मुवेंद्र' का अर्थ 'तीन प्रमुख' होता है। यह शब्द तमिल संगम कालिक कविताओं के संदर्भ में उल्लिखित है, जहां यह तमिल इलक्कैयार (शासकों) की तीन प्रमुख शक्तियों को दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question: The Vice President of India is elected for a period of _________ years.

english.explanation: The Vice President of India is elected for a term of 5 years. This term duration is specified in the Indian Constitution, and the Vice President can be re-elected for consecutive terms.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय संविधान के अनुसार, भारत के उपराष्ट्रपति को 5 वर्ष की अवधि के लिए निर्वाचित किया जाता है। इस अवधि के बाद उन्हें फिर से चुना जा सकता है। यह भारतीय संविधान द्वारा निर्धारित एक अवधि है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is highest quality coal?

english.explanation: Anthracite is the highest quality coal, characterized by its high carbon content and low impurities. It is harder and burns longer than other types like lignite, bituminous, or peat.

hindi.explanation: एन्थ्रेसाइट सबसे उच्च गुणवत्ता वाला कोयला होता है। यह कार्बन की उच्च शुद्धता और कम बुराई उत्सर्जन के कारण इंधन के उत्पादन में अत्यधिक कुशल एवं क्षमता वाला होता है। अपनी उच्च ऊष्मा उत्पादक क्षमता के कारण यह उच्च गुणवत्ता वाला माना जाता है।

questions.original_question: What are the three parts of bacterial flagellum?

english.explanation: The bacterial flagellum consists of three main parts: the filament (the long, helical tail), the hook (a flexible joint connecting the filament to the basal body), and the basal body (which anchors the flagellum to the cell membrane).

hindi.explanation: जीवाणु कशाभिका के तीन भाग आधारीय शरीर, पूंछ और तंतु होते हैं। जीवाणु कशाभिका जीवाणु की गति के लिए आवश्यक संरचना होती है। आधारीय शरीर जीवाणु के कोशिका झिल्ली से जुड़ा रहता है और इसके माध्यम से जीवाणु अपने वातावरण से जुड़ते हैं।

questions.original_question: Common name of the compound CaOCl<sub>2</sub>&nbsp;is ________.

english.explanation: CaOCl₂ is the chemical formula for bleaching powder, a compound used as a disinfectant and bleaching agent. Washing soda (Na₂CO₃) and baking soda (NaHCO₃) are different compounds, while gypsum is CaSO₄·2H₂O.

hindi.explanation: यौगिक CaOCl₂ का सामान्य नाम विरंजक चूर्ण (ब्लीचिंग पाउडर) है। यह एक ऑक्सीकारक और विरंजक है, जो अक्सर सफाई और जीवाणुनाशक के रूप में उपयोग किया जाता है। यह नामकरण इसके उपयोग के कारण होता है।

questions.original_question: k is a negative number, such that, k + k<sup>-1</sup>&nbsp;= -2, then what is the value of <span class="math-tex">\(\frac{k^2+4 k-2}{k^2+k-5}\)</span>?

english.explanation: Given k + 1/k = -2. Solving this equation: k² + 2k + 1 = 0 → (k + 1)² = 0 → k = -1. Substituting k = -1 into the expression (k² + 4k - 2)/(k² + k - 5) gives (-5)/(-5) = 1.

hindi.explanation: दी गई समीकरण k + 1/k = -2 को हल करने पर, हमें (k + 1)^2 = 0 मिलता है, जिससे k = -1 प्राप्त होता है। अब, अभिव्यक्ति (k² + 4k - 2)/(k² + k - 5) में k = -1 रखने पर, हर और अंश दोनों -5 होते हैं, जिससे मान 1 प्राप्त होता है।
key_concepts: समीकरण को सरल करना और चर का मान ज्ञात करना
अंश और हर में मान रखना और गणना करना

questions.original_question: If <span class="math-tex">\(\left(x+\frac{1}{x}\right)=5 \sqrt{2}\)</span>, then what is the value of (x<sup>4</sup>&nbsp;+ x<sup>- 4</sup>)?

english.explanation: Starting with x + 1/x = 5√2, squaring gives x² + 1/x² = 48. Squaring again yields x⁴ + 1/x⁴ = 2302.

questions.original_question: A man rows a boat a certain distance downstream in 9 hours, while it takes 18 hours to row the same distance upstream. How many hours will it take him to row three-fifth of the same distance in still water?

english.explanation: Let downstream speed = b + s, upstream = b - s. Using time ratios, solve for b = 3s. Distance D = 36s. Time for 3/5D in still water = (3D/5)/b = 7.2 hours.
Central angle is calculated as (value/total)*360. Assuming Kerala's share is 1/5 of the total, 72° is the likely answer.

hindi.explanation: पाई चार्ट में केंद्रीय कोण निकालने के लिए सूत्र है: (वर्ग का मान / कुल मान) × 360°। यदि केरल के इस्पात का उत्पादन कुल उत्पादन का 20% है, तो (20/100) × 360 = 72° होगा। इसलिए, सही उत्तर 72° है।
hindi.key_concepts: पाई चार्ट में केंद्रीय कोण, प्रतिशत गणना, कुल उत्पादन का अनुपात

questions.original_question: A shopkeeper makes a net profit of 44% on selling an article at successive discounts of 10% and 20%. Find the net profit percentage, if the shopkeeper sells the same article at a discount of 15%.

english.explanation: Original selling price is 0.72MP = 1.44CP → MP = 2CP. With 15% discount, SP = 0.85*2CP = 1.7CP → Profit = 70%.

hindi.explanation: पहले स्थिति में दो क्रमिक छूट (10% और 20%) के बाद कुल छूट = 1 - (0.9 × 0.8) = 28%। इस छूट के बाद विक्रय मूल्य = 72% अंकित मूल्य (मान लीजिए अंकित मूल्य = 100 रुपये)। दुकानदार को 44% लाभ होता है, जिसका अर्थ है 72 रुपये = 144% क्रय मूल्य। इससे क्रय मूल्य = 72 ÷ 1.44 = 50 रुपये। अंकित मूल्य = 100 रुपये, क्रय मूल्य = 50 रुपये, इसलिए अंकित मूल्य = 2 × क्रय मूल्य। अब यदि 15% छूट दी जाती है, तो विक्रय मूल्य = 85% अंकित मूल्य = 85 रुपये = 1.7 × क्रय मूल्य (क्रय मूल्य = 50 रुपये)। लाभ = 85 - 50 = 35 रुपये → 35/50 × 100 = 70%।
hindi.key_concepts: 1. क्रमिक छूट की गणना: 1 - (1 - d₁)(1 - d₂)। 2. लाभ प्रतिशत = ((विक्रय मूल्य - क्रय मूल्य)/क्रय मूल्य) × 100। 3. अंकित मूल्य, क्रय मूल्य और विक्रय मूल्य के बीच संबंध स्थापित करना।

questions.original_question: What will be the value of <span class="math-tex">\(\frac{\sin 30^{\circ} \sin 40^{\circ} \sin 50^{\circ} \sin 60^{\circ}}{\cos 30^{\circ} \cos 40^{\circ} \cos 50^{\circ} \cos 60^{\circ}}\)</span>?

english.explanation: Using sinθ = cos(90° - θ), the numerator and denominator terms cancel out, resulting in 1.

questions.original_question: What is the ratio between the HCF and LCM of the numbers whose LCM is 48 and the product of the numbers is 384?

english.explanation: Product of numbers = LCM × HCF → 384 = 48 × HCF → HCF = 8. Ratio HCF:LCM = 8:48 = 1:6.

questions.original_question: The price of a scooter increases successively by 10%, 5% and 15%. What is the total percentage increase in the price of scooter?

If areas of similar triangles &Delta;ABC and <span style="">&Delta;</span>DEF are x<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;cm<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;and <span style="">y</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span><span style="">&nbsp;cm</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span> respectively, and EF = a cm, then <span style="">BC</span> (in <span style="">cm</span>) is:

english.explanation: Area ratio = (x/y)² → side ratio = x/y. BC = (x/y) × EF = (a x)/y.

hindi.explanation: समरूप त्रिभुजों के क्षेत्रफलों का अनुपात संगत भुजाओं के वर्गों के अनुपात के बराबर होता है। यहाँ, क्षेत्रफलों का अनुपात $\frac{x^2}{y^2} = \left(\frac{BC}{EF}\right)^2$ है। EF = a सेमी दिया गया है, इसलिए $\frac{x^2}{y^2} = \left(\frac{BC}{a}\right)^2$। दोनों तरफ वर्गमूल लेने पर, $\frac{x}{y} = \frac{BC}{a}$, जिससे $BC = \frac{a x}{y}$ प्राप्त होता है। अतः सही उत्तर विकल्प 3 है।

questions.original_question: The average of the marks of 25 students in a class, in an examination was calculated to be 19. Later, the teacher realized that the marks of two students were taken as 18 and 19 respectively, instead of 14 and 15. Find the new actual average marks of the class.

english.explanation: Correct total = 475 - 8 = 467 → New average = 467 / 25 = 18.68.

hindi.explanation: मूल औसत 19 था, इसलिए कुल अंक 25 × 19 = 475। गलत रूप से लिए गए अंक 18 और 19 (कुल 37) के बजाय सही अंक 14 और 15 (कुल 29) होने चाहिए। इसलिए कुल अंकों में सही करने के बाद कमी होगी: 475 − 37 + 29 = 467। नया औसत 467 / 25 = 18.68 होगा।
key_concepts: गलत अंकों के कारण कुल योग में परिवर्तन

questions.original_question: Simplify x<sup>9</sup> &times; x<sup>5</sup> &times; x<sup>-4</sup> &times; x<sup>0</sup> &times; x<sup>-6</sup>.

english.explanation: Sum exponents: 9 + 5 -4 + 0 -6 = 4 → x⁴.

questions.original_question: The value of (sin 30<sup>&deg;</sup>&nbsp;cos 60<span style=" ">&deg;&nbsp;</span>- cos 30<span style=" ">&deg;&nbsp;</span>sin 60<span style=" ">&deg;)</span> is equal to:

english.explanation: Using sin(A - B) identity: sin(30° - 60°) = sin(-30°) = -sin30°.

hindi.explanation: दी गई अभिव्यक्ति sin30°cos60° - cos30°sin60° है। यह सूत्र sin(A - B) = sinA cosB - cosA sinB के रूप में अभिव्यक्ति के संगत है। यहां A = 30° और B = 60° है। इसलिए, अभिव्यक्ति sin(30° - 60°) = sin(-30°) हो जाती है। पाइथागोरियन सर्वसमिका से sin(-θ) = -sinθ, इसलिए sin(-30°) = -sin30°। विकल्प 2 (-sin30°) सही उत्तर है।
key_concepts: त्रिकोणमितीय सर्वसमिकाएँ (sin(A - B) = sinA cosB - cosA sinB)

questions.original_question: What is the ratio of the mean proportional between 1.6 and 3.6 and the third proportional of 5 and 8?

english.explanation: Mean proportional = √(1.6×3.6) = 2.4. Third proportional = 12.8. Ratio 2.4:12.8 = 3:16.

questions.original_question: The difference between the cost price and selling price of a pair of shoes is Rs. 1,200. If the profit is 15%. The selling price is:

hindi.explanation: माना क्रय मूल्य (CP) = x रुपये है। लाभ 15% है, इसलिए विक्रय मूल्य (SP) = x + 15% of x = 1.15x। प्रश्न के अनुसार, SP - CP = 1200, इसलिए 1.15x - x = 0.15x = 1200। हल करने पर x = 1200 / 0.15 = 8000 रुपये (CP)। विक्रय मूल्य SP = 1.15 × 8000 = 9200 रुपये।
key_concepts: लाभ की गणना = विक्रय मूल्य - क्रय मूल्य
विक्रय मूल्य = क्रय मूल्य + (लाभ प्रतिशत × क्रय मूल्य)

questions.original_question: A person lent certain sum of money at the annual rate of 25 percent on simple interest. In 6 years the interest amounted to Rs. 360 more than the sum lent. What is the sum lent?

english.explanation: Let sum be P. Interest = 0.25 × P × 6 = 1.5P. 1.5P = P + 360 → P = 720.

questions.original_question: The side of an equilateral triangle is 12 cm. What is the radius of the circle circumscribing this equilateral triangle?

english.explanation: For an equilateral triangle, the circumradius R is given by R = a / √3, where a is the side length. Substituting a = 12 cm: R = 12 / √3 = 4√3 cm.

hindi.explanation: समबाहु त्रिभुज के परिगत वृत्त की त्रिज्या का सूत्र R = a/√3 है, जहाँ a भुजा है। दिया गया a = 12 सेमी। इसलिए, R = 12/√3 = 4√3 सेमी।

english.explanation: Number of participants from S3 = 400, S4 = 500. Ratio = 400:500 = 4:5.

questions.original_question: What is the remainder when 8127 is divided by 8?
A, B and C can complete a piece of work separately in 10, 20 and 40 days, respectively. In how many days will the work be completed if A is assisted by both B and C every third day?

english.explanation: Work rates: A = 1/10, B = 1/20, C = 1/40. A works alone for 2 days, then all work together on the 3rd day. In each 3-day cycle, work done = 2*(1/10) + (1/10 + 1/20 + 1/40) = 1/5 + 7/40 = 15/40. Total time = (3/15/40) = 8 + 2/7 days.

questions.original_question: What is sin &alpha; - sin &beta;?

english.explanation: The trigonometric identity for sin α - sin β is derived using sum-to-product formulas: sin α - sin β = 2 cos[(α + β)/2] * sin[(α - β)/2].

hindi.explanation: त्रिकोणमितीय सूत्र: sinα - sinβ = 2cos((α+β)/2) × sin((α-β)/2)।

questions.original_question: A hemisphere of lead of radius 4 cm is cast into a right circular cone of height 72 cm. What is the radius of the base of the cone?

english.explanation: Volume of hemisphere = (2/3)πr³ = (2/3)π(4)³ = 128π/3. Volume of cone = (1/3)πR²h. Equate volumes: (1/3)πR²*72 = 128π/3 → R² = 128/72 = 16/9 → R = 4/3 ≈ 1.33 cm.

questions.original_question: If the angles of a triangle are (x - 46) degrees, (x + 96) degrees and 8x degrees, then what is the value of 2x?

english.explanation: Sum of angles: (x - 46) + (x + 96) + 8x = 180 → 10x + 50 = 180 → x = 13. Thus, 2x = 26 degrees.

questions.original_question: O is the centre of this circle. Tangent drawn from a point P, touches the circle at Q. If PQ = 24 cm and OQ = 10 cm, then what is the value of OP?

english.explanation: Using Pythagoras' theorem: OP² = OQ² + PQ². OQ = 10 cm (radius), PQ = 24 cm. OP² = 10² + 24² = 676 → OP = √676 = 26 cm.

hindi.explanation: स्पर्श रेखा का गुण: स्पर्श रेखा, त्रिज्या और बाहरी बिंदु से त्रिभुज निर्मित होता है। ओपी² = ओक्यू² + पीक्यू² = 10² + 24² = 676 → ओपी = √676 = 26 सेमी।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>Priya washes her clothes in the evening.</p>

options.value: <span style="">The clothes was washed by Priya in the evening.</span>
<span style="">The clothes is washed by Priya in the evening.</span>
<span style="">The clothes are washed by Priya in the evening.</span>
<span style="">The clothes were washed by Priya in the evening.</span>

english.correct_answer: 3. The clothes are washed by Priya in the evening.
english.explanation: The original sentence is in active voice: 'Priya (subject) washes (verb) her clothes (object). To convert to passive voice, the structure becomes 'Object + be + past participle + by subject.' 'Clothes' is plural, so the correct verb is 'are washed.' Option 3 is grammatically correct.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that contains a grammatical error in the underlined portion.</strong></p>

<p>It would be impossible for them to continue living in this world if each of them knew exactly what fate had it store for them.</p>

options.value: <u style="">It would be impossible for them</u><span style="">&nbsp;to continue living in this world if each of them knew exactly what fate had it store for them.</span>
<span style="">It would be impossible for them to continue living in this world&nbsp;</span><u style="">if each of them knew</u><span style="">&nbsp;exactly what fate had it store for them</span>
<span style="">It would be impossible for them&nbsp;</span><u style="">to continue living in this world</u><span style="">&nbsp;if each of them knew exactly what fate had it store for them.</span>
<span style="">It would be impossible for them to continue living in this world if each of them knew&nbsp;</span><u style="">exactly what fate had it store for them.</u>

english.correct_answer: 4. exactly what fate had it store for them.
english.explanation: The phrase 'had it store' is grammatically incorrect. The correct structure after 'had' should be a past participle. The correct phrase should be 'had stored it' or 'had stored for them.' Option 4 contains this error.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>The doctor directed the nurse to administer an ______ medicine to the patient.</p>

english.explanation: 'Alternative' means a different option, which fits the context of the doctor prescribing a different medicine. Other options like 'official' or 'eminent' do not match the context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>A piece of living tissue or plant that is transplanted surgically</p>

english.explanation: 'Graft' refers to a piece of tissue or plant transplanted surgically. The other options (gratis, gourmet, gracious) are unrelated to surgical transplantation.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct active form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The clothes will be delivered by the shop on Monday.</p>

options.value: <span style="">The shop will be delivering the clothes on Monday.</span>
<span style="">The shop will deliver the clothes on Monday.</span>
<span style="">The shop would be delivering the clothes on Monday.</span>
<span style="">The shop would deliver the clothes on Monday.</span>

english.correct_answer: 2. The shop will deliver the clothes on Monday.
english.explanation: The active voice of 'The clothes will be delivered by the shop' requires the subject (shop) to perform the action. Option 2 correctly uses 'will deliver' in the active voice.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the underlined word.</strong></p>

<p>Failure to carry a hall ticket to the exam is considered as a <u>trivial</u> issue.</p>

english.explanation: 'Trivial' means unimportant. The antonym is 'serious,' which means important or grave. Other options are unrelated to the meaning of 'trivial.'
The correct order is A (introduction of the panther), C (Johnny's encounter), D (his reaction), and B (villagers' arrival). This sequence creates a coherent narrative.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: 'Piercing' is the correct spelling. The other options (sleek, pie, itch) are spelled correctly.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>If you try to do something every day you will ______ progress.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'make progress' is idiomatic. Other options (hold, get, catch) do not fit grammatically or contextually.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Competent</p>

english.explanation: 'Competent' means having the ability or skills to do something. 'Capable' is the closest synonym. Other options (complex, poor, beginner) are unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Choose the correct meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>In weal and woe</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'in weal and woe' means through all circumstances, including good (prosperity) and bad (adversity).

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Announce</p>

english.explanation: 'Announce' and 'advertise' both mean to make something known publicly. Other options (denounce, secret, hide) are opposites or unrelated.

The correct order is Q (main clause), P (contrast), S (movement and expressions), R (participation). This creates a logical flow: 'While physical movement is important... activities may not require... movement and facial expressions... the part of teachers and students.'

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>A greenhorn</p>

english.explanation: 'A greenhorn' is an idiom for someone inexperienced. Other options (uneducated, clever, skilled) do not match the meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct direct form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>He said that something might be missing in there.</p>

options.value: <span style="">He said, &quot;Something may be missing in here.&quot;</span>
<span style="">He said, &quot;Something had to be missing in there.&quot;</span>
<span style="">He said, &quot;Something is been missing in here.&quot;</span>
<span style="">He said, &quot;Something could be missing in here.&quot;</span>

english.correct_answer: 1. He said, "Something may be missing in here."
english.explanation: In direct speech, 'might' becomes 'may' as the report is converted to direct form. The location change from 'in there' to 'in here' is likely a typographical error, but option 1 is the closest match.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the sentences that contain no spelling errors.</strong>

options.value: <span style="">Many communities in the world still feel that their voices and positions have been dissenfranchised.</span>
<span style="">Many communities in the world still feel that their voices and positions have been dysenfranchised.</span>
<span style="">Many communities in the world still feel that their voices and positions have been dysenfrenchized.</span>
<span style="">Many communities in the world still feel that their voices and positions have been disenfranchised.</span>

english.correct_answer: 4. Many communities in the world still feel that their voices and positions have been disenfranchised.
english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'disenfranchised', which means deprived of political rights. Options 1 and 2 contain misspellings ('dissenfranchised', 'dysenfranchised'), and option 3 has a misspelled word ('dysenfrenchized').
The correct order is D (introduces Scythia) → C (describes their reputation) → B (clothing) → A (additional clothing detail). 'DCBA' follows this logical sequence.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>He used to reply / that the only place / for which he went / was the town library.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'for which he went' is grammatically incorrect. The correct structure should be 'to which he went' for clarity. The other segments are grammatically sound.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the underlined word in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The <u>sporadic</u> instructions of the invigilators distracted the examinee.</p>

english.explanation: 'Sporadic' means occurring irregularly or infrequently. 'Occasional' is the most accurate synonym. 'Continuous' and 'Repetitive' are opposites, while 'Indirect' is unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p><u>Rajan is having</u> three brothers and three sisters.</p>

english.explanation: 'Rajan is having' is incorrect because 'has' is the correct verb form to indicate possession. 'Is having' implies a temporary action, which is not appropriate here.
